page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT IN SOUTHEND
page.content: {General}:High Rise office and Admin area of CBD in this sq.Of the 155,815 popn in Southend,68,500 work 9,120 are unemployed (Aug 1984). {Offices}:35% of workers commute to London and 25000 commute within 8 mile of town centre.Office technology,low rates and pool of local office skills has led to major relocations to Southend e.g.Customs and Excise 5793 workers,Access 2095.Now 69% of South- end workers in services of which Bank Insur/Finance totals 5911 workers, Professional/Scientific 5847 workers. {Admin/Utilities}: Southend Council 2117 workers,Essex CC 1677,Hospl 1418,B.T.+GAS 4585. {Other }:Only 20% in manufacturing (electronics e.g MK Electric biggest 934 workers,engineering,printing and clothing).Agriculture minimal (0.4%) construction,energy and water 9.2%.
